creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
While porting to Ajp13 from TC3.1 and Ajp12 my file upload servlet broke. Changing back to Ajp12 solved the problem. It looks like Ajp13 is mangling the multi-part request. 

Interestingly everytime a read a block from the bufffer the ByteStream read methid printed a 'Y' to System.out. 

The mod_jk.conf file and the servlet code was posted to tomcat-user this afternoon (12 dec 00)
